page.title: 17A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: WHEN WE WERE INSIDE MY TEACHER TOLD US TO DO SOME MATHS WHICH HE HAD WRITTEN ON THE BOARD. WE HAD TO DO THIS WITH PARTNERS. MY PARTNER WAS DEBBIE. WE WENT OUT TO PLAY AT 2.15. AFTER PLAY WE HAD TO CARRY ON WITH THE MATHS UNTIL IT WAS TIME TO GO HOME.AT 3.15 WE CLEARED OUR DESKS,PUT OUR CHAIRS UP ON THE DESKS AND SAID PRAYERS. WE THEN PUT OUR COATS ON AND WENT OUTSIDE TO CATCH THE BUS.WHEN IT GOT TO BOLE (MY VILLAGE)I GOT OFF AND STARTED WALKING TO MY HOUSE. WHEN I GOT HOME I WENT TO PLAY WITH DEBBIE UNTIL TEA TIME. AFTER TEA I WENT TO PLAY WITH SARAH. I STOPPED PLAYING WITH SARAH AT 7.00. I WENT HOME AND HAD A BATH. I WENT TO BED AT 8.00 AND READ UNTIL 9.00 WHEN I WENT TO SLEEP.
